manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tnhy_reply` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '规则ID', `picture` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动图片', `description` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动描述', `weixin` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '公号', `tzurl` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '链接', `gunzhu` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '活动描述', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
